sense.gloss: to pierce, to stab, to prick, to stick, to thrust
to sew, to stitch, to embroider
to put (a runner) out, to pick off

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はもう↑少↑↓すこ↓しで↑私↑↓わたし↓の↑目↑↓め↓を↑鉛筆↑↓えんぴつ↓で↑突↑↓つ↓き|↑刺↑↓さ↓す|ところだった。
sdata.e: You nearly poked me in the eye with your pencil.

sdata.j: ↑人↑↓ひと↓をナイフで|↑刺↑↓さ↓す|のはやめましょう。
sdata.e: Let's refrain from stabbing people with knives.

sdata.j: ↑実際↑↓じっさい↓はそんなことあるわけないが、↑釘↑↓くぎ↓を|↑刺↑↓さ↓す|にはちょうどよさそうだ。
sdata.e: There's no way something like that would really happen, but it seemed just right to drive the point home.
